query:
ALTER TABLE workPermits 
ADD COLUMN candidateName VARCHAR(255) AFTER employeeName,
ADD COLUMN iqamaNumber VARCHAR(50) AFTER employeeNationalId,
ADD COLUMN jobTitle VARCHAR(255) AFTER occupation,
ADD COLUMN calendarEventId VARCHAR(255) AFTER renewalReminderSent;
